trans-unit.source: Exposes an array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.IValidator"></xref> references.
trans-unit.target: 公开的数组<xref href="System.Web.UI.IValidator"></xref>引用。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Each ValidatorCollection reference is associated with a validation server control contained on the requested page.
trans-unit.target: 每个 ValidatorCollection 引用都有一个包含请求的页上的验证服务器控件相关联。

trans-unit.source: These controls add themselves to this collection when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object is handled.
trans-unit.target: 这些控件将自己添加到此集合时<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>处理对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Init>

trans-unit.source: They remove themselves when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Unload> event of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object is handled.
trans-unit.target: 他们删除本身时<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Unload>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>处理对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Unload>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class inherits both of these methods from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>类继承这两种方法从<xref:System.Web.UI.Control>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: You can access this collection, its methods, and its properties through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validators%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问此集合、 其方法和通过其属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validators%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validators%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the tested condition of any validator in this collection fails, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果此集合中的任何验证程序的测试的条件失败，<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性设置为`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified validation server control to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 指定的验证服务器将控件添加到<xref href="System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: When added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection> collection of a <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validators%2A> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.IValidator> implementation takes part in validation.
trans-unit.target: 当添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection>集合<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>对象通过<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validators%2A>属性，<xref:System.Web.UI.IValidator>实现参与验证。</xref:System.Web.UI.IValidator> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validators%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection>

trans-unit.source: Its <xref:System.Web.UI.IValidator.Validate%2A> method is called together with the <xref:System.Web.UI.IValidator.Validate%2A> methods of all other validators.
trans-unit.target: 其<xref:System.Web.UI.IValidator.Validate%2A>方法调用连同<xref:System.Web.UI.IValidator.Validate%2A>的所有其他验证程序的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.IValidator.Validate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.IValidator.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: All validators then share in determining whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object as a whole is valid.
trans-unit.target: 确定然后共享所有的验证程序是否<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>对象作为一个整体是否有效。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: The validation server control to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的验证服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified validation server control is contained within the page's <xref href="System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否指定的验证服务器控件是否包含在该页面的<xref href="System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: The validation server control to check for.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的验证服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the validation server control is in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>验证服务器控件是否处于集合;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Copies the validator collection to the specified array, beginning at the specified location.
trans-unit.target: 验证程序集合复制到指定数组的指定位置开始。

trans-unit.source: The collection to which the validation server control is added.
trans-unit.target: 验证服务器控件添加到集合。

trans-unit.source: The index where the validation server control is copied.
trans-unit.target: 验证服务器控件复制到其中的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of references in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取集合中的引用的数目。

trans-unit.source: The number of validation controls in the page's <xref href="System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 验证控件的数目在页的<xref href="System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> instance for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection"></xref>集合。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Use this method to create an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> instance that can be iterated through easily to get each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法创建<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>可以轻松循环获取每个项的实例<xref:System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>找不到。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection"></xref> collection is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection"></xref>集合是只读的。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该集合为只读的;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection"></xref> collection is synchronized.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection"></xref>集合已同步。

trans-unit.source: If the collection is synchronized, it is thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 如果集合已同步，它是线程安全的。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the collection is synchronized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果集合已同步;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the validation server control at the specified index location in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取位于指定的索引位置中验证服务器控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: The index of the validator to return.
trans-unit.target: 要返回的验证程序的索引。

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified validator.
trans-unit.target: 指定的验证程序的值。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified validation server control from the page's <xref href="System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 从页面中删除指定的验证服务器控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: The validation server control to remove from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 要从集合中移除的验证服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 获取可用于同步的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.ValidatorCollection"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to synchronize the collection with.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>同步具有的集合。</xref:System.Object>
